QuestData.Title: Mixmaster Jasper
QuestData.Description: Mind giving some of this stuff to Jasper, over by the luxury suites? I'm sure he can find some use for it.$b$bThanks, $n!
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Sassy's Samples to Mixmaster Jasper in Hardwrench Hideaway.
QuestData.CompletionText: Hey, is that the stuff? From the magazine?
QuestData.RewardText: I'll file these away for now. Maybe we can experiment later.$b$b<Jasper looks over at you.>$b$bYeah, you'll do.
